channel.title: So...what do your songs tell about you?
channel.description: Tracks tell allot about their producers. My tracks tell allot about what I like, and dislike. For example, I made a song showing my love towards ice cream...and I just made a track showing my love of pineapples....anyways! What do your tracks show about you? And why?

item.title: So...what do your songs tell about you?
item.dc:creator: MetricMusicDivision
item.description:
My songs tell others that I am a beginner, and my latest tracks tell others I love dubstep and EDM

item.title: So...what do your songs tell about you?
item.dc:creator: foryou
item.description:
i don‚Äôt write music to tell people about myself. i write music to express my feelings towards people. lately i‚Äôve been writing songs for certain people in my lifeüíñit‚Äôs a lot more meaningful than simply making something happy because i‚Äôm happy. if you make something for someone you care about, you‚Äôre gonna put in the extra effort to make it phenomenal, and you‚Äôre gonna make sure you make it special in some way.

Read full topic

item.title: So...what do your songs tell about you?
item.dc:creator: Dadmother
item.description:
The music I write is an expression. Whether it‚Äôs the result of trying to process a difficult time, express my love, spark joy, invoke fear, or sink into some kind melancholy, everything I write is just that: an expression. I suppose I don‚Äôt necessarily have a particular thing I‚Äôm trying to communicate with it.
